title: Hashtag Activism In 2014: Tweeting 'Why I Stayed'
teaser: NPR's Audie Cornish speaks with Bev Gooden, creator of the hashtag #whyIstayed. The hashtag took off in September after the Ray Rice scandal, when many asked why women stay in abusive relationships.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
